name: Wii U Disk Image File
summary: A WUD file is a disk image file dumped from a Wii U game disc. It contains information about a Wii U game that can be run by an emulator , such as Cemu, on a computer. WUD files are typically split into segments because of the large amount of information in a Wii U game.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
